description: Try our easy to follow Traditional Bolognese Sauce recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Bolognese,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Beef,Soy free,Wheat free,Mince,Tomato,Peanut free
name: Traditional Bolognese Sauce Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500g beef mince with carrots onion celery & tomato

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large frying pan over medium heat. Add onion, carrot, celery, garlic and bacon and cook for 10 minutes or until vegetables have softened. Add mince and seasoning and cook, stirring with a wooden spoon to break up mince, for 10 minutes or until browned. Stir in tomato paste, passata and stock. Bring to the boil, reduce heat to low and simmer for 30 minutes or until sauce thickens. Add basil and season.
Serve with pasta (or use to fill cannelloni) and parmesan. Garnish with parsley, if using.
